name: Timeless Time Piece
description:
Fun! Comfortable! Eclectic! Unique in Design!

Gals, I know we don't usually buy a piece of jewelry for ourselves but let me just say you won't be disappointed for purchasing this Fun design!

This quartz watch is hand-crafted with a flare for the extraordinary! Each design contains an array of precious stones such as raw emeralds, amber, carnelian, lapiz, jade and turquoise. A rainbow of freshwater pearls adorn the wrist along side sterling silver bali spacers and bead caps. A fun sterling silver link chain finishes off the wristband then fastened with a strong feminine toggle.

This will become your most treasured everday piece of jewelry! As Unique in design as the woman wearing it!!!

name: Moon Goddess Necklace
description:
Magical Design for the Goddess in You!

Genuine Chevron Amethyst mixed with the magical protection of Tiger's Eye creates a powerful combo in this 20" necklace.  Finished off with a sterling silver toggle clasp.

The Beauty stands centered in the sterling silver Goddess Moon pendant. She is the symbol of our feminine energy.

Comes gift ready wrapped in our elegant black box and finished off with a silk bronze ribbon.

name: Meditation in Pink & White Bracelet
description:
When Mystic Heart Artists create this bracelet what happens is magical...

Because each pearl and each riverstone is rosary wrapped in sequence to create the circle; a meditative state of mind occurs and a beautiful creation is its result. To wear this feminine beauty is one treasure and the other is to know the Artist put their love into creating it just for You.

We finished this piece with a signature of our French Heritage here in New Orleans by including a Fleur de Lis sterling silver charm to the sterling toggle.

7" bracelet is finished off with a sterling silver toggle clasp.

name: Classic Freshwater Pearls Bracelet
description:
Freshwater pearls from 4mm to 7mm in the classic cream color mixed with a Swarovski bronze pearl create this beautiful bracelet that reflects timeless beauty in a woman.

The center freshwater pearl is coin-shaped that gives this gorgeous bracelet a feminine design.  

Our Studio has a limited number of these Japanese pearls in stock!
5 left in inventory!!!  Order today!

name: Elements of Nature Bracelet
description:
Precious stones from around the world have been collected to create this unique bracelet design.  From Tiger's eye to jaspers to freshwater pearls this eclectic bracelet will become your favorite piece of jewelry to wear everyday!

Our artists carefully choose the stones that hold Nature's energy within them.  The 7" bracelet is finished off with a sterling silver lobster claw clasp.
